snippet.title: Let's Play: Delete Part 1
snippet.description:
ahh, this game is really fun~ but apparently it's also really short... but with a bunch of different endings ^^

*I had some caffeine and was feeling a little anxious when I recorded this... sorry orz

~story~ 
A boy wakes up and seems to have lost his memory, not remembering anything but his own name 
and his mother. Eager to find answers as to why he lost his memory, he ventures around the 
familiar, yet unfamiliar facility to find his mother. Though, before he can leave the room, 
he crashes into a girl and she tells him to not leave his room for no particular reason.

Regardless, he still leaves and she in return, tags along. The more he ventures around, 
the more it seems as though the place had been completely deserted, no one else to be found
except the strange girl that .. continues to follow him around. The computers that have access
to the main system have all either malfunctioned, or unusable in one way or another. Hence, the
only way he can actually figure out what happened, and possibly where his mother had gone, is by 
accessing the Main Frame, which is no easy feat.
 
Desperate to find answers, he ventures into the facility deeper, and uncovers things that he 
might've preferred not to remember. 

Created by jestereir: https://twitter.com/jestereir

Link to game: http://gamejolt.com/games/delete/77395
